Class PatientRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.PatientRepository
public class PatientRepository extends Object
The PatientRepository class manages the operations related to storing, updating, retrieving, and saving patient records. It loads and saves patient data from an Excel file and provides functionality for retrieving patient details, updating patient information, and retrieving patients under a specific doctor.

This class relies on ExcelReaderWriter for reading and writing patient data from/to an Excel file. It also uses MedicalRecordRepository to manage medical records and AppointmentRepository to retrieve the list of patients under a specific doctor.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
ARIEL KWOK DAI HUI

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientRepository

      public PatientRepository() throws IOException
      Constructs a new PatientRepository object, loading patient data from the Excel file into memory.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the patient data from the file.

  • Method Details

    • loadPatientList

      public List<Patient> loadPatientList() throws IOException
      Loads patient data from the Excel file and returns a list of Patient objects. This method parses patient information such as hospital ID, patient ID, name, gender, date of birth, blood type, email, and contact number. It also loads the medical records for each patient using the MedicalRecordRepository.
      Returns:
      A list of Patient objects containing the patient data from the Excel file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the patient data from the file.

    • loadPatientInfo

      public Patient loadPatientInfo(String hospitalId) throws IOException
      Loads patient information by their hospital ID from the patient list.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID of the patient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Patient object with the specified hospital ID, or null if the patient is not found.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the patient data.

    • retrievePatientsUnderDoctor

      public List<Patient> retrievePatientsUnderDoctor(Doctor doctor) throws IOException
      Retrieves a list of patients under a specific doctor based on their appointments. This method first loads the list of patient IDs assigned to the given doctor through the AppointmentRepository, and then returns the list of Patient objects whose patient IDs match those under the doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor object whose patients are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Patient objects assigned to the given doctor.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the patient or appointment data.

    • updatePatientInfo

      public void updatePatientInfo(Patient patient) throws IOException
      Updates the information of an existing patient in the patient list and saves the updated list to the Excel file.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object containing the updated patient information.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while updating the patient data and saving it.
